TopicTitle: Anyone else having trouble with Kerbals falling?

Articles.Content: I made another ship using the 2 man lander module (the old one). But when I'm on Kerbin, and doing a test for ladder access, My Kerbals fall to the ground as soon as you click on EVA. They are not holding onto the ladder at the pod any more. And yes, I've built the ship right. I can take a picture if you insist. Anyone else having this problem?
Yes. I've noticed the same thing since 0.20 came out.
been having this problem since .18! also they "fall" in orbit too?! lost a few solar panels on that account
